charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:860(a) Conspiracy With Intent to Distribute Methamphetamine Within 1,000 Feet of A Public School. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 168 Months Custody of Bureau of Prisons; 10 Years Supervised Release; Pay A .00 Special Assessment; And Pay 2,580.71 For The Total Expenditure of The USA For Jurors Reporting on 05/07/01 (That Sum Shall Not Bear Interest in This Court)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:860(a) Conspiracy With Intent to Distribute Cocaine Within 1,000 Feet of A Public School. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2 of The Indictment is Dismissed on Motion of The USA.
